description.black-white:
The user cuts with its long horn. The odd
power contained in the horn does physical
damage to the target.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Damage calculation always uses the target's Defense, regardless of this move's damage class.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts damage based on the target's Defense, not Special Defense.
